docs.lead_paragraph: Johanna Satekge was pregnant with her first-born when she tested positive for HIV in South Africa's Limpopo province in 2000.

headline.main: South African Mother Turns Tragedy Into Fight Against HIV-Thomson Reuters Foundation
headline.print_headline: South African Mother Turns Tragedy Into Fight Against HIV-Thomson Reuters Foundation

docs.snippet: Johanna Satekge was pregnant with her first-born when she tested positive for HIV in South Africa's Limpopo province in 2000.

docs.lead_paragraph: The board in Gilbert, Ariz., said two pages in a biology textbook that discuss sexually transmitted diseases and contraception violated a state law passed in 2012.

headline.main: In Arizona, a Textbook Fuels a Broader Dispute Over Sex Education
headline.print_headline: In Arizona, a Textbook Fuels a Broader Dispute Over Sex Education

docs.abstract: School board in Gilbert, Ariz, votes to excise or redact two pages of biology textbook that discusses sexually transmitted diseases and contraception; says references violate state law requiring schools to favor teaching childbirth and adoption over abortion; board is trying to figure out how to remove material in question, despite resistance from parents, residents, and others.
docs.snippet: The board in Gilbert, Ariz., said two pages in a biology textbook that discuss sexually transmitted diseases and contraception violated a state law passed in 2012.

docs.lead_paragraph: A Texas woman has founded Fund Texas Choice, to help finance lodging and transportation when nearby facilities are shut down.

headline.main: Activists Help Pay for Patients’ Travel to Shrinking Number of Abortion Clinics
headline.print_headline: Activists Help Pay for Patients’ Travel to Shrinking Number of Abortion Clinics

docs.abstract: Lenzi Sheible of Austin, Tex, founded nonprofit organization Fund Texas Choice to help finance travel costs for low-income women seeking abortions; more than half of state's abortion clinics have closed since May 2013.
docs.snippet: A Texas woman has founded Fund Texas Choice, to help finance lodging and transportation when nearby facilities are shut down.

docs.lead_paragraph: Anastasia Massey returned to her apartment and found a gunman waiting outside her door, the police said. Her child was delivered in an emergency cesarean section but later died.

headline.main: Pregnant Woman, 27, Is Fatally Shot in Queens
headline.print_headline: Woman, 27, in 25th Week of Pregnancy Is Fatally Shot

docs.abstract: Gunman fatally shoots Anastasia Massey, who is 25 weeks pregnant, in her Queens apartment; baby is delivered by emergency cesarean section but dies shortly after; police have made no arrests and are searching for suspect and motive.
docs.snippet: Anastasia Massey returned to her apartment and found a gunman waiting outside her door, the police said. Her child was delivered in an emergency cesarean section but later died.

docs.lead_paragraph: Industry groups, energy companies and 20 states are challenging the E.P.A.'s interpretation of the law and whether the costs of adhering to regulations should be taken into account.

headline.main: Supreme Court to Hear Challenge to Rules on Mercury From Power Plants
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court to Hear Challenge to Rules on Mercury From Power Plants

docs.abstract: Supreme Court will hear arguments over limits set by Environmental Protection Agency on emissions of mercury and other toxic pollutants from coal-fired power plants.
docs.snippet: Industry groups, energy companies and 20 states are challenging the E.P.A.'s interpretation of the law and whether the costs of adhering to regulations should be taken into account.

byline.original: By ADAM LIPTAK and CORAL DAVENPORT

docs.lead_paragraph: At an international conference on justice and rights, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan on Monday said that women should not be regarded as equal to men and condemned feminists for rejecting motherhood.

headline.main: Turkish President Says Women Shouldn’t Be Considered Equals
headline.print_headline: Turkish President Says Women Shouldn’t Be Considered Equals

docs.abstract: Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan, during international conference on justice and rights for women, declares that women should not be regarded as equal to men; also says that pregnancy is obstacle to equal opportunity in the workplace and denounces feminists for rejecting motherhood.
docs.snippet: At an international conference on justice and rights, President Recep Tayyip Erdogan on Monday said that women should not be regarded as equal to men and condemned feminists for rejecting motherhood.

headline.main: You Can Freeze Your Eggs. You Can't Freeze Time.

docs.abstract: Apple and Facebook have started a useful conversation with the novel perk of enabling employees to freeze their eggs. But I have a message for women considering this option: it may not work.
docs.snippet: Apple and Facebook have started a useful conversation with the novel perk of enabling employees to freeze their eggs. But I have a message for women considering this option: it may not work.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations agreed on Friday that all members should  pass and enforce laws banning child marriages, resolving to end a practice that affects about 15 million girls every year.

headline.main: United Nations Members Resolve to End Child Marriage
headline.print_headline: United Nations Members Resolve to End Child Marriage

docs.snippet: The United Nations agreed on Friday that all members should  pass and enforce laws banning child marriages, resolving to end a practice that affects about 15 million girls every year.

docs.lead_paragraph: An expanded version of “The Business of Being Born,” a documentary by the actress Ricki Lake that some experts say plays down the risks of delivering babies at home, will debut on Netflix.

headline.main: Home-Birth Film by Ricki Lake Prepares for Redelivery, Worldwide
headline.print_headline: Home-Birth Film Prepares for Redelivery, Worldwide

docs.abstract: Updated and expanded version of 2008 Ricki Lake documentary The Business of Being Born will be re-released in January 2015, becoming available globally for the first time; documentary is still criticized by some members of the American medical system who argue that Lake's enthusiasm for at-home births does not show how dangerous process can be.
docs.snippet: An expanded version of “The Business of Being Born,” a documentary by the actress Ricki Lake that some experts say plays down the risks of delivering babies at home, will debut on Netflix.

headline.main: Our Marriage Ended. Our Family Did Not.

docs.abstract: Of course we tried staying together for the sake of our son. Until one night, during one of our fine-tuned feuds, our shouting woke up the baby.
docs.snippet: Of course we tried staying together for the sake of our son. Until one night, during one of our fine-tuned feuds, our shouting woke up the baby.
